==Useful Info==
'''Searing wretches''' are incendiary [[undead]] found in [[Gehenna]]. Strong, tough melee threats, their melee attacks can also temporarily reduce your [[fire resistance]]. 

==Tips & Tricks==
*If you can afford to, try to avoid being in melee. [[Borgnjor's Vile Clutch]], [[Disjunction]], etc. can work.
*Searing wretches are not fast, have no ranged attacks nor can they travel through [[lava]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], searing wretches had an attack that would apply [[Sticky Flame]] to the target.
*Prior to [[0.30]], searing wretches had fast regeneration.
*Searing wretches were added in [[0.28]].
